full_summary:
### 21C41-230431 - Tender for Rubber Floor Tile and Adhesive
#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4132763336-Doc4132818530
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4132763336
* **Publication Date:** August 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 28, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Tender Overview

This tender invitation seeks vendors with expertise in supplying rubber floor tile and adhesive. The tender notice was corrected to reflect a new closing time, superseding the initial posting on the CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery platforms.

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Request Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Geographic Scope

* **Delivery Region:** Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region

#### Contract Details

The tender is being managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC). The contract includes the supply of rubber floor tile and adhesive.

#### Contact Information

* **Purchasing Officer:** Stanley Chui
* **Email:** stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17106584?extsite=MTcxMDY1ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17106584?extsite=MTcxMDY1ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Additional Information

All required documents and submissions must be received by August 28, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. Please note that the tender has expired and is no longer accepting new proposals.  ANSWERSнутьBefore I begin rewriting the text, I want to clarify that you want me to write this in a more formal and
